TEXT.TITLE: SAMSON ENERGY CO LIMITED PARTNERSHIP <SAM> YEAR
TEXT.BODY: Net loss 14,144,000 vs loss 863,000 Revs 10.3 mln vs 16.7 mln NOTES: 1986 loss includes write-down of 15.1 mln dlrs in the carrying value of oil and gas properties taken in the first quarter Cash flow from operationswas 6,237,000 dlrs, or 3.01 dlrs per unit, vs 9,315,000 dlrs, or 4.56 dlrs per unit Reuter
